      • StartStopSoundLoop

        public StartStopSoundLoop(processing.core.PApplet p,
                          java.lang.String name,
                          int length,
                          boolean autoStop)
        A loop that contains a starting sound, a looping sound, and an ending sound.
        Parameters:
        p - the PApplet
        name - identifier
        length - how long it is in frames, all files must be this length
        autoStop - whether or not it should end on its own after a while.
